name: Always Stay Dry In Candle Land
name_original: Always Stay Dry In Candle Land
description: (Demo) but active in the works. You are a candle, your gonna have to stay dry from rain and water mobs, your in candle land but the rains have come along with the beasts, survive 30 days do you think you can? If you use shop it will extend days but also your tolerance to getting wet as a candle as it adds more wax to you, Wick mechanics coming soon and more mobs other than the slime. :D
